prompt.name: p101
prompt.text:
The game is over!

Your score is

prompt.name: p102
prompt.text: Try and solve more questions on percentage to improve your score!

prompt.name: p103
prompt.text:
Welcome to LEVEL 2 !!

Read the questions carefully and answer them.

prompt.name: p104
prompt.text:
Well done!!

You have saved our planet
from the aliens.

prompt.name: p106
prompt.text:
You did not seem to shoot all the aliens.
Come on, try again.

prompt.name: p107
prompt.text:
You did not shoot the alien.
Try shooting in the next question.

prompt.name: p110
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

10% of any number is same
as dividing the number by 10.

prompt.name: p120
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

20% of any number is the same as
dividing that number by 5.
If you find, dividing by 5 difficult,
you can also calculate 10% of the
number and multiply the answer
with 2.

prompt.name: p125
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

25% is nothing but one quarter of
the whole. 25% of any number is
same as dividing that number
by 4.

prompt.name: p130
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

30% of any number is same as
dividing the number by 10 and
multiplying the result with 3.
In short, calculate 10% of the
number and multiply with 3 to
get 30% of the number.

prompt.name: p140
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

40% of any number is same as
dividing the number by 10 and
multiplying the result with 4.
In short, calculate 10% of the
number and multiply with 4
to get 40% of the number.

prompt.name: p150
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

50% is nothing by half of the whole.
50% of any number is same as
dividing the number by 2
or finding half of that number.

prompt.name: p175
prompt.text:
Did you notice?

75% is three-quarters of the whole.
75% of a number is same as
multiplying the number with Â¾.
Three quarters of a number is
greater than half of the number but
less than the whole of that number.

instruction.name: inst3
instruction.text:
You are the shooter. You need to save the planet!!

1. Read the question.
2. The alien is hiding in the spaceship which is the answer to the question.
3. Shoot the alien by pressing the space bar.
4. Use the left and right arrow keys to move the shooter.

Go!! Save the planet from the aliens.

instruction.name: inst3_tablet
instruction.text:
You are the shooter. You need to save the planet!!

1. Read the question.
2. The alien is hiding in the spaceship which is the answer to the question.
3. Shoot the alien by tapping the red button on the shooter.
4. Drag or pull the shooter to move the shooter around.

Go!! Save the planet from the aliens.

instruction.name: inst4
instruction.text:
Choose any percent
to start the game.
